name: @tonk/sprinkles
description: Unified dev environment for Tonk - runs host-web and relay together

scripts.predev: pnpm run build:wasm && pnpm run build:sw && pnpm run build:relay
scripts.build:wasm: cd ../../packages/core-js && pnpm run build:wasm && pnpm run build:wrapper
scripts.build:sw: cd ../../packages/host-web && NODE_ENV=development pnpm run build && NODE_ENV=development pnpm run build:sw && pnpm run copy-sw-for-dev
scripts.dev:host-web: cd ../../packages/host-web && PORT=4000 NODE_ENV=development pnpm run dev:with-proxy
